action.action-desc: Ms. Stevens introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To amend the Weather Research and Forecasting Innovation Act of 2017 to expand the goals of the tornado warning improvement and extension program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Tornado and Windstorm Innovation for Safety and Tracking Enhancement Research Act or the TWISTER Act.

section.header: Expansion of goals of tornado warning improvement and extension program
section.text: Section 103 of the Weather Research and Forecasting Innovation Act of 2017 (15 U.S.C. 8513; relating to the tornado warning improvement and extension program) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking The goal of such program and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:
In carrying out paragraph (1), the Under Secretary shall ensure the development of innovative tornado forecasts, predictions, and warnings, with a particular focus on the following:

subparagraph.text: Fast-developing storm systems, such as derechos.
